alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Snyder; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 12:52AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHUMBERLAND...EASTERN SNYDER...MONTOUR...SOUTHEASTERN LYCOMING...COLUMBIA...EAST CENTRAL UNION AND SOUTHEASTERN SULLIVAN COUNTIES THROUGH 145 AM EDT... At 1251 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Montoursville to 15 miles northwest of Enola. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bloomsburg, Berwick, Sunbury, Shamokin, Milton, Mount Carmel, Lewisburg, Selinsgrove, Danville, Northumberland, Kulpmont, Winfield, Muncy, Watsontown, Elysburg, Fairview-Ferndale, Hughesville, Riverside, Trevorton and Shamokin Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Snyder; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Union
